SEARCH
Package babbynannyapi.model

Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
babbynannyapi.model.Recipe
public class Recipe extends Object
Represents a prescription or medication instruction for a Baby. This class stores the name of the medicine, the dosage amount, and the number of times the dose should be administered. It is used within a MedicalRecord to describe treatment details.
